caption: Uniform Resource Locator
name: url
description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) object describes the path and category of a URL. See RFC 1738. Defined by D3FEND d3f:URL.

hostname.description: The URL host as extracted from the URL. For example: www.example.com from www.example.com/download/trouble.

path.description: The URL path as extracted from the URL. For example: /download/trouble from www.example.com/download/trouble.

resource_type.description: The context in which a resource was retrieved in a web request.

url_string.description: The URL string. See RFC 1738. For example: http://www.example.com/download/trouble.exe. Note: The URL path should not populate the URL string.
